mapper.select: SELECT imagename, imageext, image_path FROM ( SELECT imagename, imageext, image_path, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY store_idx ORDER BY IS_IDX DESC) AS rn FROM IMAGE_STORE WHERE store_idx = ${store_idx} ) ranked_images WHERE rn <= 2
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BANNER (BANNER_IDX, STORE_IDX, IMAGENAME, IMAGEEXT, IMAGE_PATH, RDATE) VALUES (BANNER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{store_idx}, #{imagename}, #{imageext}, #{image_path}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT STORE_IDX, IMAGE_PATH, RDATE FROM BANNER ORDER BY RDATE ASC
